task.title: Where Do I Start If I am New to Design Studio Development?

taskbody.context:
Here are some resources for developers joining the Design Studio development team: Compulsory:
Model driven architecture/development
Eclipse/OSGi platform (OSGi R4 specs, browse through the Eclipse Equinox project and read articles on Eclipse.org)
Eclipse plugin/bundle development (read/exercise the articles on Eclipse.org)
Eclipse Modeling Framework (EMF) (read/exercise the articles on Eclipse.org)
Eclipse Model to Text (M2T, Xpand) (formerly known as openArchitectureWare) (read/exercise the articles on Eclipse.org)
Eclipse Graphical Editing Framework (GEF) (read/exercise the articles on Eclipse.org)
Eclipse Graphical Modeling Framework (GMF) (read/exercise the articles on Eclipse.org)
Optional:
Eclipse Web Tools Platform (WTP)
Business Process Management (BPM)
